description: JavaScript React repeater module for cloning ui elements
name: @jfxteam/react-repeater

scripts.deploy: npm i add-dependencies -g && npm i npm-check-updates -g
scripts.fix-start: ncu -u -n "/^@jfxteam.*$/" && npm --no-git-tag-version version pre%fix-type% && npm publish
scripts.fix: ncu -u -n "/^@jfxteam.*$/" && npm --no-git-tag-version version prerelease && npm publish
